description.ko: 보이지 않는 것이 실체가 되는 곳, 소리의 건축이 대지의 정적 속에서 솟아오릅니다.
description.en: The invisible made manifest, where the architecture of sound rises from the stillness of the earth.

prompt: A vast landscape of vibrating architectural glass pillars of varying heights, forming a physical 3D waveform across a silent digital desert. The pillars resonate with visible frequency ripples in the air, colored in intense bursts of #FF4500 and #4169E1. Sharp focus on the microscopic vibrations on the glass surfaces. 8k, raytracing, Octane Render. The lighting mimics a sunset over a digital sea, creating long, dramatic shadows that visualize the silence and the hidden consonance of sound.
